ArtifactMeta.title: ArtifactMeta
ArtifactMeta.description: Metadata for artifacts uploaded to MinIO (e.g. LoRA, voice, video).

bucket.description: MinIO bucket where the artifact is stored.

key.description: Object key inside the MinIO bucket.

size_bytes.description: Size of the artifact in bytes.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the artifact was created.

content_type.description: Optional MIME type of the artifact (e.g. 'image/png').

ArtifactUploadResult.title: ArtifactUploadResult
ArtifactUploadResult.description: Result of a successful artifact upload.

ok.description: Indicates whether the upload was successful.
